Help:
I can help you to manage your passwords. You no longer have to write passwords in notebook or remember all the passwords, they will be encrypted and stored in a safe place. I will even generate passwords for you, all you need - copy, paste and forget it.
{0} - add new account
{1} - show all your accounts
{2} - password generator settings
{3} - change language
{4} - cancel action
{5} - show this message

To get password you need - just send me account name to search for it.

If you use Telegram for mobile, *you just have to tap on password to copy it!* `Try it.`

There's also faster hardcore version of adding a new account:

/add Account name
`[Optional]` Link
`[Optional]` Login
`[Optional]` Password
LangIsSet: Your language has been set to English.
AddLink: Good. Now you can add an optional link for your account or use suggested.
AddNote: You can also add a note that contains additional info about account.
AddLogin: Nice. Choose a login for your account.
AddPassword:
Now you should send or generate a password for your account.
Use a strong password with upper and lower case, numbers and special characters, you do NOT need to remember this password.
Use {0} to set up password generator.
AddEncryptionKey: If you want to encrypt the password (which you *MUST* do if it's not some junk account), send me the encryption key.
AddAccount:
Okay, a new account. Choose a name for it, for example name of service this account belongs to.
That's not login! You will recognize account by its name.
Use several words (like tags) to help yourself find it in the future.
NoAccounts:
You have no accounts.
Add a new one: {0}
NotFound:
There is no accounts you are searching for.
Add a new one: {0}
MaxLength: Max {0} length is {1} characters. Try again.
SureDeleteAcc: Are you sure want to delete this account?
UpdateAccData: Send me new {0} for this account.
DefaultPattern: Pattern has been set to default.
SetUpPassword:
Here you can adjust password generator settings. Select which characters and cases will be used in password.
Example of generated password: {0}
EnterLength: Enter new password length between {0} and {1} characters.
EnterHint:
Please enter a hint of your encryption key.
This can be anything that can help you recall the key.
*FOR GOD'S SAKE, NEVER WRITE DOWN ACTUAL KEY IN HINT! THAT'S NOT HOW SECURITY WORKS*.
EncryptInstruction: In order to encrypt password, send the encryption key in reply to this message.
